Jinni Lotto is operated by Jinni Tech Limited of First Floor, Jubilee Building, Victoria Street, Douglas,
Isle of Man, IM1 2SH

Jinni Tech Ltd is licensed and regulated by the Isle of Man Gambling Supervision Commission under a licence issued under the Online Gambling Regulation Act 2001
on [date and year]. Please note, this license is not applicable to players residing in the UK.

Jinni Tech Ltd does not operate a lottery. Members place bets on the outcome of national lotteries. Official lottery tickets and insurance are purchased based on the bets placed so that all winnings are equal to the cash option of national lottery winnings.
